ygData.subject: Re: Vampiric embrace or lifetap?
ygData.msgSnippet: All in all I think it would be.  Vampiric embrace for an SK right now doesn t replace that much health and is a random event.  Lifetap can be cast when we need
ygData.messageBody:
All in all I think it would be. Vampiric embrace for an SK right now
doesn't replace that much health and is a random event. Lifetap can be cast
when we need to replace hp. Generally Rangers and Paladians can cast heals
mainly after combat and SK's have a huge downtowntime as a result.

Right now if I play without a healer type in the party VE is the only way to
get HP back (other then bandaging after the fact). And when it does go off,
it really seems to piss off the mob and then they hit me for twice as much
as I just embraced for. ouchie!

------------------------------
Let me ask this -- if Vampiric Embrace was replaced with a Lifetap, would
that be considered an improvement?

Brian
